function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Propagation of SARS-CoV-2 aerosols in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of long-distance transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Implementing proper indoor airflow plan and ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air conditioning, ventilation equipment","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Risk of short-range transmission of small droplets","Impact":"Potential short-range transmission of the virus within 1 meter distance","Mitigation":"Maintaining safe distances between individuals and proper ventilation","Technologies":"Social distancing measures, air purification systems","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Suspension of aerosols up to 10 μm in diameter indoors","Impact":"Increased risk of aerosol transmission in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Regulating indoor humidity and implementing air quality measures","Technologies":"Dehumidifiers, air purifiers","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
